amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain types of human-animal chimeras.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1771, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 212.

action.text: Amendment SA 1771 proposed by Senator Braun to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3494-3495; text: CR S3494) To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain types of human-animal chimeras.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1771, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 212.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1771, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 212.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1771 proposed by Senator Braun to Amendment SA 1502.
